thread.title: Great hotel in great location
thread.title_full: Great hotel in great location - Review of The Premier New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sdegreff
title: Great hotel in great location
text: We have been staying at The Premier once a month for the past 6 months. The hotel is very well located and has the bonus of including a light breakfast in the price. The rooms are also a good size (especially compared to other New York hotels). But it is the hotel staff that makes us return regularly...especially Monique at the front desk! She has been incredibly helpful to us every time we stay there and always with a big smile. She is the best!
